snippet: The New York Times’s staff scours the Web for interesting and peculiar items. Monday’s selections include an attack on Mark Zuckerberg’s Facebook page to focus attention on privacy and security issues. Plus, McAfee, the Internet security firm,...
abstract: The New York Times’s staff scours the Web for interesting and peculiar items. Monday’s selections include an attack on Mark Zuckerberg’s Facebook page to focus attention on privacy and security issues. Plus, McAfee, the Internet security firm, expressed concern over trying to quantify the total financial loss of cybercrime.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Zuckerberg's Facebook Page Hacked and McAfee's Regrets
